channel.title: Players reset upon logout in World 2
channel.description: I've recently added a World 2 to my server and every time players log out they get reset so I'm unable to give people mod or admin. On world 1 when people log out they get saved fine. What's wrong in World 2?

item.title: Players reset upon logout in World 2
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Thanks anyways guys. I fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Players reset upon logout in World 2
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

for one of my old servers i made it where if you click world 2 if automatically changes port from 43594 to 5555 and causes them to log in a different world.

Read full topic

item.title: Players reset upon logout in World 2
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

My save method is broken up into different parts. This is what I found that make any sense.

disconnected = true; if (saveNeeded) savegame(true);

Read full topic
